languages.text: "Тебе было тяжело свершить это, дочь. Я понимаю. Я сожалею. Но так пожелал Неумирающий".
"This was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I understand, and I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."
languages.original_text: "Тебе было тяжело свершить это, дочь. Я понимаю. Я сожалею. Но так пожелал Неумирающий".

traits.locale_text: "It was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I can understand. I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."
"It was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I can understand. I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."
"This was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I understand, and I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."
"This was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I understand, and I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."
"This was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I understand, and I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."
"This was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I understand, and I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."

languages.text: « Ce fut une rude épreuve, ma fille. Je comprends, et j'en suis navré, mais telle était la volonté de l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: "This was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I understand, and I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."

traits.locale_text: « Ce fut une rude épreuve, ma fille. Je comprends, et j'en suis navré, mais telle était la volonté de l'Immortel. »

languages.text: «También ha sido difícil para ti, hija mía. Lo entiendo, y te pido perdón. Tales eran los deseos del Inmortal».
languages.original_text: "This was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I understand, and I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."

traits.locale_text: «También ha sido difícil para ti, hija mía. Lo entiendo, y te pido perdón. Tales eran los deseos del Inmortal».

languages.text: 「お前にとって辛い決断だったな、娘よ。理解しているし、申し訳なく思う。だがそれこそが不死の者の望みだったのだ」
languages.original_text: "This was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I understand, and I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."

traits.locale_text: 「お前にとって辛い決断だったな、娘よ。理解しているし、申し訳なく思う。だがそれこそが不死の者の望みだったのだ」

languages.text: “这对你来说非常困难，我的女儿。我能理解，我也非常遗憾，但这就是不死之神的意愿。”
languages.original_text: "This was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I understand, and I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."

traits.locale_text: “这对你来说非常困难，我的女儿。我能理解，我也非常遗憾，但这就是不死之神的意愿。”

languages.text: "Das war schwierig für Euch, meine Tochter. Das verstehe ich, und es tut mir leid. Doch das war der Wille des Todlosen."
languages.original_text: "This was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I understand, and I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."

traits.locale_text: "Das war schwierig für Euch, meine Tochter. Das verstehe ich, und es tut mir leid. Doch das war der Wille des Todlosen."

languages.text: "Bunu yapmanın senin için zor olduğunu anlıyorum kızım. Üzgünüm. Ancak Ölmeyen'in arzusu buydu."
languages.original_text: "This was difficult for you to do, my daughter. I understand, and I am sorry. But such was the Undying One's wish."
